name: The Price of Victory
description:
While in pursuit of a dangerous criminal, an unknown enemy emerges. Fight your way to the truth, and save the planet from annihilation.

Heavily inspired by old school games such as: Mega Man, Contra, R-Type, Gradius, and The Guardian Legend.

A game with a $0.00 budget. Art, music, and programming by myself.

Software: Game Maker: Studio, KORG DSN-12, Audacity

Here is a video of the game being played.
